documents.document: @tweedy151 @PennyRed, If you believe social justice is bullshit, you're alt-right. Plenty of normal people think marginalised people matter.

@Krisjohn @cueballAU, I've decided to form or join a group to pressure current/future Australian governments into imposing sanctions on USA.
@Cueball_AU, b) Address the global threat it represents; c) help US citizens, both non-financially and... d) financially; e) fight fascism.
@Cueball_AU, So what can us foreigners do to: a) raise awareness among others in a way that's empowering, not just worrying; 2/...
@Cueball_AU, So, it's obvious to me that you're one of the few people outside USA who recognise Trump's administration as a calamity. 1/...

@summerbrennan, Me too, and I'm a straight man who has lived in Australia all my life.
@PinkSarcophagus, ultimately, real charisma only comes from inside; must b learned/grown. Then you can be popular & powerful, young padawan.
@PinkSarcophagus, Remember that it's possible to fake charisma (surgery, clothes, makeup) and people may believe it for a while...
@PsychoSting, Are you going to @Genghis_Con?

@PinkSarcophagus, I know someone who did that once, with a car-load of crushed aluminum cans. The container refund money paid for the fuel.
@TheLadyLycan, Growing old disgracefully is an art form.
@KaiTalks, Hi! Can you please DM me your e-mail so I can keep you up-to-date on the Web site restore?
@blondie_6E, Messy. Stay safe! *hug*
@Strange_Animals, "TAKE ME TO YOUR LEADER, EARTHLING"
@strange_animals, I DON'T NEED DRUGS ANY MORE.
@toastasaurus, You are doing so much for people. I'm in awe of the effort and heart you are putting into everything. Courage is infectious!
@blondie_6E, Nice hat.
@glipschitz, Telstra claims it was ordered by the Federal Court of Australia. Their message quotes "Section 115A of the Copyright Act 1968".
@Strange_Animals, "This is OUR plant. Bugger off!"
#WordOfTheDay: entirety (thanks to @toastasaurus: https://t.co/jvoqgugxIv )
I saw a mall santa scaring kids with threats of coal or rotten potatoes. It's almost like we train kids to fear Christmas.
@ashedryden, Seems if anyone is stopped for something like this, then the EFF might be of use. Maybe not at the time, but PR help after?
@blondie_6E, Does this mean that if I send you selfies, you'll Photoshop santa hats onto them? Coz if so, deal's off, babe.
@ashedryden, Sounds cool. What's it about?
@PinkSarcophagus, Maybe you should stop growing meat plants then. :-D
#WordOfTheDay: lucrative (thanks to @blondie_6E: https://t.co/WpeNSwO6Gb )
@dril, Yes, but what is your opinion on people making veiled references to my wife's asshole!?
@SenatorLudlam, Just found out you've taken leave to deal with stuff; I'm thinking of you. If you ever want to talk about anxiety, I'm here.
@kessily, It's a kind of arsehole solidarity moment for many of them.
@kessily, Would it be fair to say that until Ferguson (and similar brutalities) and the election the US didn't really know itself?
@kessily, Indeed. I'd argue there's been a lot of improvement; just unevenly distributed. I think a lot of progressive people don't realise.
@kessily, Sadly bigotry, ignorance and xenophobia are a massive part of many sections of US society. Change takes vast amounts of time.
@kessily, Yeah, but fortunately I'm seeing more action and discussion than I am disillusionment.
@kessily, I snorked near the end of the list!
@kessily, Holy shit, that's grand. Did you do that?

@pjf, Better that than hallucinations brought on by sleep deprivation. Hallucinations are not graceful.
@errbufferoverfl, You're a wizard!
@pcaffin, It's worse for us than you think. Malcolm Turnbull had nothing bad to say about Trump, so our leader thinks our paths are aligned.
@hipikat, Interesting. Why do you think they wrote that in advance? And statistically, it's going to happen right?
@freakboy3742, Replying to an old tweet to see if you're still looking for phone answering services that will follow a script? I am too.
@kagij, People probably said the same thing about Abbott.
Dear @BrownesDairy, I bought your Mango Passionfruit yoghurt and my girlfriend thought it was "pretty bloody spectacular". Good work!
Trump won. Game over. #election2016 #fascism
@lisaxy424, WHAT WAS YOUR SECOND INSTINCT??
#WordOfTheDay: jest (thanks to @ShannaGermain: https://t.co/aDbAa8TIYM )
@OaklandElle, The biggest problem with Trump is not what he will do, but what he is happy to encourage in others. Orders of magnitude worse.
@pypikat, It's like someone decided Unix was too easy, and thought "how can we make this like a cross between VMS and a Warhol painting?"
@ksylor, Was there a traffic jam (a.k.a. gridlock) outside? X-)
@LilMsTangent, That's the awesomeest 5 pictures I've ever seen!
@blondie_6E, Can't you just stay home and jerk off to Garth Brooks records? :-) PS -- How was the tractor ride?
@lisaxy424, Wrong! *unzips and pretends I have a sock fetish*

@fluffygutss, Oops, I didn't read far enough ahead! Hope to see you next week.

@Strange_Animals, totally #badass
@Mad_Harri @Orientdan, No such thing as reverse racism (i.e. towards white people)... it's not discrimination if directed at the privileged.
@Strange_Animals, I like how "an ambush predator" is as specific as you can get, because no-one has ANY DUCKING IDEA what that thing is.
@PinkSarcophagus, I dare you to snort coke out of my butt crack on my 69th birthday.
@ian, Whereas most Muslims think of IS as a bunch of blood-thirsty, divisive blasphemers.
@ian, Well no, most real theocracies are plagued by cronyism, pork barreling, ego stoking, graft, etc. but at least they do religion well.
@georgefwoods, It's like a circle-jerk where no one will look each other in the eye.
@ian, I think it's problematic to call IS a theocracy. More like a military dictatorship lightly garnished with the trappings of religion.
@PennyRed, Thank you. The world needs to hear about this clown car in a suit, this coke-addled, asinine shitfight pretending to be human.
You know you've been eating too much chocolate when water tastes savoury.
